body.p:
.Pittsburgh, Pa
January 26th 1865
His Excellency ,Gov. Bramlette
Executive Department,
.Frankfort Ky
Sir:
I would respectfully solicit the appointment of of this City as Commissioner of for the .Chatham T. EwingKentuckyState of Pennsylvania

The oil Excitement among our people has led many of them to invest largely in your state and to facilitate exchanges and transfers of territory located there Some of us are desirous to have a Commissioner of Kentucky in our midst and I may add, that Mr. Ewing, for whom we ask the appointment is a young attorney of our bar, of irreproachable honor and well fitted for the office

Trusting that you will favor my request I remain
Very Rsply
D. H. Hazen

Comr Deeds
Chatham T. Ewing
Pennsylvania
apptd & comd
31st Jany 1865
